thread.title: Iowa girl held down by bullies who wrote 'loser' on face | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Iowa girl held down by bullies who wrote 'loser' on face | Daily Mail Online

author: Regina F. Graham For Dailymail.Com
title: Iowa girl held down by bullies who wrote 'loser' on face | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad 'It hurt my feelings': Iowa girl, 10, is held down on school bus by two bullies who wrote 'loser' on her forehead using a black Sharpie Raeann Dabney says she was held down by two Titan Hill Intermediate School girls while riding school bus home last Tuesday She says girls wrote 'loser' on her forehead and drew a mustache and beard on her face Of the incident, she said: 'I was crying and trying to move but they kept holding me down. It hurt my feelings for someone to write 'loser' on my head' Her father immediately reported incident to school officials who conducted an investigation and disciplined the two girls involved Her parents are not satisfied with the response from the school and they've opened an investigation with Council Bluffs Police Published: 06:53 GMT, 7 February 2017 | Updated: 10:46 GMT, 7 February 2017 98 shares
